name: Morse Tutor
description:
A morse code typing tutor. Use the radio tower in the lower left to see which morse characters you are typing and try to stop the bombs. Note, that characters need to be entered fully in sequence to count. Eg "H" is .... not . . . .

Requires Windows. It needs a bit of work, but I ran out of time to make levels and scoring and stuff. alt f4 to quit.

It takes a second to get used to the timing. start by just trying to make various sequences of Morse code and watch the radio tower in the lower left to see what you made. Watch the video if you are still having trouble.

Morse code timing is very particular and this tutor tries to teach good practices:
See official morse code timing rules here
